name: Subhash Chandra Bose    সুভাষ চন্দ্র বসু   ''Shubhash Chôndro Boshu''
known_for: Prominent Figure of Indian independence movement activism and reorganizing and leading the Indian National Army in World War II
party: Indian National Congress, Forward Bloc founded by him on 3 May, 1939
alma_mater: University of Calcutta, University of Cambridge
